DataElement.preferredName: First Greater Than or Equal To Platelet Count 20000 Recovery Occurrence Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator the describes if the initial recovery platelet count greater than or equal to 20000 occurred.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: First Greater Than or Equal To Platelet Count 20000 Recovery Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways._Indicates a platelet count of at least 20,000 per cubic millimeter._A healing process and/or an outcome implying relative health.  The term is typically used in the context of direct and indirect effects of sickness or injury._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredName: First Greater Than or Equal To Platelet Count 20000 Recovery
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.:A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that either both objects are the same in quantity or measure or value or status or that the object of interest exceeds the other object in one of these ways.:Indicates a platelet count of at least 20,000 per cubic millimeter.:gradual healing (through rest) after sickness or injury.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or space or degree.

Indicates a platelet count of at least 20,000 per cubic millimeter.
A healing process and/or an outcome implying relative health.  The term is typically used in the context of direct and indirect effects of sickness or injury.

ReferenceDocuments.name: BRIDG mapping for CDE:2775850
ReferenceDocuments.description: [IF NOT EXISTS THEN "Never dropped below"] PerformedClinicalResult.value WHERE PerformedClinicalResult > PerformedObservation >  DefinedObservation.nameCode = "Perform initial platelet count" AND PerformedClinicalResult.value IS LESS THAN OR EQUAL TO "20 x 10^9/L"   [ELSE IF EXISTS THEN "Yes"] PerformedClinicalResult.value WHERE PerformedClinicalResult > PerformedObservation >  DefinedObservation.nameCode = "Perform initial platelet count" AND PerformedClinicalResult.value IS GREATER THAN OR EQUAL TO "20 x 10^9/L"   [ELSE THEN "No"]
